channel.title: CVE Feed for Cybozu, Inc. -- Cybozu Garoon
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cybozu, Inc. -- Cybozu Garoon

item.title: CVE-2020-5566|2024-08-04T08:30:24.608Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Improper authorization vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 4.0.0 to 4.10.3 allows remote authenticated attackers to alter the application's data via the applications 'E-mail' and 'Messages'.

item.title: CVE-2020-5584|2024-08-04T08:30:24.584Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cybozu Garoon 4.0.0 to 5.0.1 allow remote attackers to obtain unintended information via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2020-5587|2024-08-04T08:30:24.547Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cybozu Garoon 4.0.0 to 5.0.1 allow remote authenticated attackers to obtain unintended information via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2020-5588|2024-08-04T08:30:24.579Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.0.1 allows attacker with administrator rights to obtain unintended information via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2020-5582|2024-08-04T08:30:24.684Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cybozu Garoon 4.0.0 to 5.0.1 allows remote authenticated attackers to bypass access restriction to alter the data for the file attached to Report via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2020-5564|2024-08-04T08:30:24.553Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 4.0.0 to 4.10.3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the application 'E-mail'.

item.title: CVE-2020-5568|2024-08-04T08:30:24.562Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 4.6.0 to 5.0.0 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the applications 'Messages' and 'Bulletin Board'.

item.title: CVE-2020-5565|2024-08-04T08:30:24.581Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 4.0.0 to 4.10.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to alter the application's data via the applications 'Workflow' and 'MultiReport'.

item.title: CVE-2020-5583|2024-08-04T08:30:24.599Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cybozu Garoon 4.0.0 to 5.0.1 allows remote authenticated attackers to bypass access restriction to obtain unauthorized Multi-Report's data via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2020-5580|2024-08-04T08:30:24.566Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cybozu Garoon 4.0.0 to 5.0.1 allows remote authenticated attackers to bypass access restriction to view and/or alter Single sign-on settings via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2020-5562|2024-08-04T08:30:24.585Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 4.6.0 to 4.6.3 allows a remote attacker with an administrative privilege to issue arbitrary HTTP requests to other web servers via V-CUBE Meeting function.

item.title: CVE-2020-5581|2024-08-04T08:30:24.622Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 4.0.0 to 5.0.1 allows remote authenticated attackers to obtain unintended information via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2020-5643|2024-08-04T08:39:25.512Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.0.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker to delete some data of the bulletin board via unspecified vector.

item.title: CVE-2020-5563|2024-08-04T08:30:24.587Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 4.0.0 to 4.10.3 allows remote attackers to obtain data in the affected product via the API.

item.title: CVE-2020-5586|2024-08-04T08:30:24.548Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 4.10.3 to 5.0.1 allows attacker with administrator rights to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2020-5567|2024-08-04T08:30:24.657Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 4.0.0 to 4.10.3 allows remote attackers to obtain data in Application Menu.

item.title: CVE-2020-5585|2024-08-04T08:30:24.653Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.0.1 allows attacker with administrator rights to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39457|2024-08-02T04:26:14.283Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cybozu Garoon 6.0.0 to 6.0.1 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability in PDF preview. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on a logged-in user’s web browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-39457|2024-07-19T16:47:46.468Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cybozu Garoon 6.0.0 to 6.0.1 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability in PDF preview. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on a logged-in user’s web browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-31399|2024-06-11T14:21:43.839Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Excessive platform resource consumption within a loop issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2. If this vulnerability is exploited, processing a crafted mail may cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

item.title: CVE-2024-31403|2024-06-11T13:49:23.480Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Incorrect authorization vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 6.0.0 allows a remote authenticated attacker to alter and/or obtain the data of Memo.

item.title: CVE-2024-31402|2024-06-11T05:21:04.938Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Incorrect authorization vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker to delete the data of Shared To-Dos.

item.title: CVE-2024-31398|2024-06-11T14:54:17.236Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user who can log in to the product may obtain information on the list of users.

item.title: CVE-2024-31404|2024-06-11T14:22:13.532Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.5.0 to 6.0.0, which may allow a user who can log in to the product to view the data of Scheduler.

item.title: CVE-2024-31401|2024-06-11T18:53:43.047Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker with an administrative privilege to inject an arbitrary script on the web browser of the user who is logging in to the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-31397|2024-06-11T13:31:56.444Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Improper handling of extra values issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user who can log in to the product with the administrative privilege may be able to cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

item.title: CVE-2024-31400|2024-06-11T15:46:25.361Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.0. If this vulnerability is exploited, unintended data may be left in forwarded mail.

item.title: CVE-2024-39457|2024-07-19T08:36:27.786Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Cybozu Garoon 6.0.0 to 6.0.1 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability in PDF preview. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on a logged-in user’s web browser.

item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker with an administrative privilege to inject an arbitrary script on the web browser of the user who is logging in to the product.

item.description: Incorrect authorization vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 6.0.0 allows a remote authenticated attacker to alter and/or obtain the data of Memo.

item.description: Incorrect authorization vulnerability in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker to delete the data of Shared To-Dos.

item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.5.0 to 6.0.0, which may allow a user who can log in to the product to view the data of Scheduler.

item.title: CVE-2024-31398|2024-08-02T01:52:56.926Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user who can log in to the product may obtain information on the list of users.

item.title: CVE-2024-31400|2024-08-02T01:52:56.946Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.0. If this vulnerability is exploited, unintended data may be left in forwarded mail.

item.title: CVE-2024-31397|2024-08-02T01:52:56.934Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Improper handling of extra values issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user who can log in to the product with the administrative privilege may be able to cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

item.title: CVE-2024-31399|2024-08-02T01:52:56.795Z -- cybozu%2C%20inc. -- cybozu%20garoon
item.description: Excessive platform resource consumption within a loop issue exists in Cybozu Garoon 5.0.0 to 5.15.2. If this vulnerability is exploited, processing a crafted mail may cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.
